text: prthirai arau akhiraatara bisaye. Manuhe tomaka iyatimasakalara bisaye prasna karae; koraa, ‘sihamtara babe subyarastha karaa uttama’. Tomaloke yadi sihamtara lagata ekelage thaka tente sihamta tomalokarae bha'i. Allahe jane kona upakarai arau kona anistakarai. Arau allahe iccha karaile e'i bisaye niscaya tomalokaka kastata pelaba parailehemtena. Niscaya allaha prabala paraakramasali, prajnamaya
